title: SEO for Single-Page Apps with Headless Chromium
description: Any Single-Page Application can have strong SEO. This post shows you how with an open source example.
author: Dhruv Dang
footer: **If you enjoyed this post, and would like to work together, you can reach me at hi@dhruv.io.** *Huge thanks to Kevin Yank for motivating me to write this post during our Elm Town podcast episode.*
